title: 477 21 "The Power That Will Shorten One's Life! Energy Hormone, Redux!"Transliteration: "Inochi o Kezuru Chikara – Tenshon Horumon Futatabi" (Japanese:命を削る力 テンション・ホルモン再び) Naoyuki Itō Yoshiyuki Suga November 28, 2010(2010-11-28)[25]
transformers_text: 477 21 The Power That Will Shorten One's Life Energy Hormone Red ux Transliteration In och i o Ke zur u Chikara Ten shon Ho rum on Futa tabi Japanese Nao yuki It Yoshiyuki Suga November 28 2010 2010 11 28 25 Ace thinks back to his childhood when he fought with anyone who spoke ill of Roger and wondering if he should ever have been born In the present he s touched by everyone fighting for him and tearfully realizes that he wants to live Buggy comes to after recovering from being frozen and notices that Mr 3 is gone White beard doubles over in pain while fighting Aka in u enabling Aka in u to severely injure him and distracting Marco and Jo zu long enough for them to be injured by Ki zar u and Aoki ji Luffy asks for Ivan kov to give him Tension Hormones as final rep u est to enable him to fight again and save Ace Ivan kov refuses saying that it will likely kill him and never face Dragon but Luffy responds by saying that he would rather die than fail to save Ace causing Ivan kov to agree restoring Luffy s energy Coby despite being afraid earlier and Helm ep po's advice to stay out now that the Marines are almost certain to win goes out to fight
tf_idf_text: power shorten one life energy hormone red transliteration och zur chikara ten shon rum futa tabi japanese nao yuki yoshiyuki suga november ace think back childhood fought anyone speak ill roger wonder ever bear present touch everyone fight tearfully realize want live buggy come recover frozen notice go white beard double pain fight aka enable aka severely injure distract marco long enough injured zar aoki luffy ask ivan kov give tension hormone final rep est enable fight save ace ivan kov refuse say likely kill never face dragon luffy respond say would rather die fail save ace cause ivan kov agree restore luffy energy coby despite afraid early helm po advice stay marine almost certain win go fight
